description: News about The 'Innocence of Muslims' Riots (Nakoula Basseley Nakoula), including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: The 'Innocence of Muslims' Riots (Nakoula Basseley Nakoula)
title_page: The 'Innocence of Muslims' Riots (Nakoula Basseley Nakoula) - The New York Times
maintext:
Populist Hero or Demagogue: Who Is Tunisia’s President?
As a law professor, Kais Saied preached strict adherence to the Constitution. As Tunisia’s president, he has bent it to his will. Will he save Tunisia’s democracy or destroy it?
